Sentencas: The coupling of a pressurized solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and a gas turbine has been proven to result in extremely high efficiency and reduced emissions.
Titulo: Gas turbine size optimization in a hybrid system considering SOFC degradation

Sentencas: The presence of the gas turbine can improve system durability compared to a standalone SOFC, because the turbomachinery can supply additional power as the fuel cell degrades to meet the power request.
Titulo: Gas turbine size optimization in a hybrid system considering SOFC degradation

Sentencas: Since performance degradation is an obstacles to SOFC systems commercialization, the optimization of the hybrid system to mitigate SOFC degradation effects is of great interest.
Titulo: Gas turbine size optimization in a hybrid system considering SOFC degradation

Sentencas: In this work, an optimization approach was used to innovatively study the effect of gas turbine size on system durability for a 400 kW fuel cell stack.
Titulo: Gas turbine size optimization in a hybrid system considering SOFC degradation

Sentencas: A larger turbine allowed a bigger reduction in SOFC power before replacing the stack, but increased the initial capital investment and decreased the initial turbine efficiency.
Titulo: Gas turbine size optimization in a hybrid system considering SOFC degradation

Sentencas: Thus, the power ratio between SOFC and gas turbine significantly influenced system economic results.
Titulo: Gas turbine size optimization in a hybrid system considering SOFC degradation
